amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to insert the text of H.R. 3605, the Patients' Bill of Rights Act of 1998.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute to create standards to protect access to care and contain the text of the bill H.R. 3605, Patients' Bill of Rights Act.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Dingell.
On agreeing to the Dingell amendment (A001) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 212 - 217 (Roll No. 336).
